mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_CREDITLIMSGMT set CREDITLIMTYPE = #{CreditLimType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIMLOOPFLG = #{LimLoopFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDITLIM = #{CreditLim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CY = #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONEFFDATE = #{ConEffDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONEXPDATE = #{ConExpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSTATUS = #{ConStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDITREST = #{CreditRest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDITRESTCODE = #{CreditRestCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO = #{CreditLimSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO, CREDITLIMTYPE, LIMLOOPFLG, CREDITLIM, CY, CONEFFDATE, CONEXPDATE, CONSTATUS, CREDITREST, CREDITRESTCODE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_CREDITLIMSGMT where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO = #{CreditLimSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO, CREDITLIMTYPE, LIMLOOPFLG, CREDITLIM, CY, CONEFFDATE, CONEXPDATE, CONSTATUS, CREDITREST, CREDITRESTCODE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_CREDITLIMSGMT
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CREDITLIMSGMTM (CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO, CREDITLIMTYPE, LIMLOOPFLG, CREDITLIM, CY, CONEFFDATE, CONEXPDATE, CONSTATUS, CREDITREST, CREDITRESTCODE, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO, CREDITLIMTYPE, LIMLOOPFLG, CREDITLIM, CY, CONEFFDATE, CONEXPDATE, CONSTATUS, CREDITREST, CREDITRESTCODE,'0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_CREDITLIMSGMT where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO = #{CreditLimSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_CREDITLIMSGMT set isDel = #{isDel} where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO = #{InCtrctDelSeqNo}
mapper.select: select count(1) from PBCRS_REPORT_CREDITLIMSGMT where CREDITLIMSGMTSEQNO =#{0} and isdel='1'
